text: The Opposite Sex and How to Live with Them is a 1993 American comedy movie directed by Matthew Meshekoff. It stars Courteney Cox, Arye Gross, Kevin Pollak, Connie Sawyer, Susan Cookson, Julie Brown, Steven Brill, Amanda Foreman, Kimberlin Brown, Lisa Waltz and was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * Category:1993 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Miramax movies Category:Movies set in Boston
title: The Opposite Sex and How to Live with Them
